pullrequest.title: World Modeling 1 -- Box and sphere on ground plane

content.raw:
actually, it wasn't always part of the spec; it was added in pull request #91

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/91/implement-generation-of-xml-schema-files/diff#chg-sdf/1.4/world.sdf

the following sdf file is used for rendering the spec, and it doesn't have this element:

* https://s3.amazonaws.com/osrf-distributions/sdformat/api/full_1-4.sdf

I don't know what our process is for uploading those files; I think Nate did it?
content.html:
actually, it wasn't always part of the spec; it was added in pull request #91

  • https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/91/implement-generation-of-xml-schema-files/diff#chg-sdf/1.4/world.sdf

the following sdf file is used for rendering the spec, and it doesn't have this element:

  • https://s3.amazonaws.com/osrf-distributions/sdformat/api/full_1-4.sdf

I don't know what our process is for uploading those files; I think Nate did it?
